passages.text:
You wake up to find yourself in a large maze of thorny hedges and you have no idea how you got there. You're in the middle of the road.

[[Go straight->Forward]]
[[Go backwards->Backwards]]
passages.name: The Hedge

passages.text:
The sky is dark as you trek on ahead. There's a fork in the path.

[[Left->Left]]
[[Right->Right]]
passages.name: Forward

passages.text:
The hedges start to open up to a wide, open, circular space. You see an exit at the other end of the room.

[[Go back->The Hedge]] 
[[Go forward->Through the Room]]
passages.name: Backwards

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Right

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Through the Room
